```{r}
library(htmltools)

d <- highlight_key(exam_data_2)
p <- ggplot(d,
            aes(ENGLISH,
                MATHS)) +
  geom_point(size = 1) +
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0,100),
                  ylim = c(0,100))

gg <- highlight(
  ggplotly(p) %>% layout(height = 300, width = 300),
  "plotly_selected"
)

crosstalk::bscols(
  widths = 12,
  div(style = "height: 300px; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;", gg),
  DT::datatable(d, 
                class = "compact",
                options = list(pageLength = 5))
)
```
